newsitem.title: MEXICO: Banorte mulls bid for Aseguradora Obrera.
newsitem.headline: Banorte mulls bid for Aseguradora Obrera.

text.p: Grupo Financiero Banorte is eyeing insurer Aseguradora Obrera and may make a bid, a top executive said on Thursday.

"The process of studying the purchase of Aseguradora Obrera is very advanced. Its owners, who are the unions, are keen to get out of that sector, so they want to sell it and Banorte is interested," Manuel Sescosse, director general of marketing at Banorte, told reporters.

Othon Ruiz Montemayor, director general of the banking group, recently expressed interest in the insurance business, saying it would complement the fledling private pension system that Banorte is involved in.
He said he was looking at commercial insurance and life insurance possibilities.
Aseguradora Obrera is run by petrochemical, sugar, electricity and broadcast unions.
